roleset.name: get rid of
roleset.note: DUMP-V NOTES: Will this have an instrument? Intuition says no. (from dump.01-v)

role.descr: agent, entity getting rid of something
instrument or manner, if separate from agent

example.name: dump-v: transitive, no instrument
example.text: Unable to unload UAL and other airline shares, takeover-stock speculators, or risk arbitragers, dumped every blue-chip stock they had.

roleset.name: have the characteristics of a dump (or a blob)
roleset.note: DUMPY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SS. (from dumpy.01-j)

example.name: dumpy-j: arg1
example.text: Ha ! It 's true though ! Lancaster is dumpy !
